name: Lost Present
description:
Christams is right around the corner and there is only one present that was left undelivered and ITS YOURS. Will you make it until christmas?

Deliver it under three minutes to win

Post your times in comments!  (Record is 130 seconds)

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

Space - jump

R - reset

Download pc version if you want to stop falling through floor and have a better expierence. :)))))
